ItemTemplate.Name: Content Part
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a general content part and its necessary files in the project: part itself, full driver, empty handler, display and editor shape templates. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.

ItemTemplate.Name: Content Part with Record
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a content part with a record and its necessary files in the project: commonly used files and migrations. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.

ItemTemplate.Name: Content Part with Type
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a content part with content type and its necessary files in the project: commonly used files, migrations and constants. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.

ItemTemplate.Name: Content Part with Type and Record
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a content part with content type and record and with its necessary files in the project. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.

ItemTemplate.Name: Dependency with Implementation
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates an interface inherited from IDependency and a class implementing this interface. Both files are located in a .cs file but without the 'I' prefix in the filename.

ItemTemplate.Name: Empty Shape Template File
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates an empty cshtml file to the location you selected.

ItemTemplate.Name: Settings Content Part
ItemTemplate.Description: Generates a settings content part and its necessary files in the project using the conventions of settings part development. IMPORTANT: Make sure that you selected the project root. NOTE: Placement.info is not generated or appended.

ProjectTemplate.Name: Orchard 1.10 Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Adding an Orchard 1.10 module to your solution.

ProjectTemplate.Name: Orchard 1.9 Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Adding an Orchard 1.9 module to your solution.
